text: Pantalkalil pataravitappatta kotikalum, pataravitappatata cetikalum, peritta marankalum ulla colaikalaiyum, pucikkattakka vitavitamana kay, kari, taniyankalaiyum, onrupolum vela; verakavum torramalikkum jaittun (olivam) matulai akiyavarraiyum, avane pataittan. Akave avai palanalittal avarrin palaniliruntu puciyunkal. Avarrai aruvatai ceyyum kalattil atarkuriya (katamaiyana) pakattaik kotuttu vitunkal. Vin virayam ceyyatirkal- niccayamaka avan (allah) vin virayam ceypavarkalai necippatillai
